remarks: A Moore collection which is closed under finite unions called _topological_; such a collection is the closed sets of a canonically associated topology.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)
statement:
mretopd.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. ( Moore ` B ) ) $.
mretopd.z $e |- ( ph -> (/) e. M ) $.
mretopd.u $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. M /\ y e. M ) -> ( x u. y ) e. M ) $.
mretopd.j $e |- J = { z e. ~P B | ( B \ z ) e. M } $.
mretopd $p |- ( ph -> ( J e. ( TopOn ` B ) /\ M = ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) $.
$d B x y z $.
$d J x y $.
$d M x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
